# `SetContentTemplateActionSettings` Definition

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| smsContentTemplateId | `string` | Yes | A String containing the SMS contentTemplateId. |
| emailContentTemplateId | `string` | Yes | A String containing the Email contentTemplateId. |
